title: Ebhardt on U.S. Auto Sales (Audio)

description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. (Carol solo)\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Tommaso Ebhardt\u0010Senior Reporter\u0010Bloomberg Editorial\u0010Will discuss his story on Ferrari considering an addition of a four seat utility vehicle.
